t: Amazon.com: San Francisco Bay Brand Brine Shrimp Hatchery Kit, includes 3-packets of Brine Shrimp Hatch Mix : Pet Supplies
s: I am still on my first packet (almost on to the second) and I have had a massive batch of babies everyday. Most eggs hatch 24-36 hours later but mine usually hatch around 20 hours. Heat is recommended, but not needed. I keep mine right next to my fish tank and it does fine. I do notice some unhatched eggs, but not very many at all and you'll get some unhatched eggs no matter what brand eggs you get. This product saved me a lot of time and headaches. I was going to buy a second hatchery...
